alert.note: Alert for St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 15 at 8:45PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southern Maryland, including the following county: St. Marys. * WHEN...Until 245 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 842 PM EST, gauge reports indicated heavy rain. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - A gauge on the St. Marys River near Great Mills indicates it is near minor flood levels. At this river level, Flat Iron Road begins to flood, and some yards are flooded in Great Mills. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lexington Park... California... Great Mills... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
